main_topic.author: Dylan Liu
main_topic.title: What is 8b-chat-hf in kaggle's llama3 models?
main_topic.content:
If I'm right, Llama 3 has a normal version and an instruct version. 

In [https://www.kaggle.com/models/metaresearch/llama-3/Transformers/8b-chat-hf/1](https://www.kaggle.com/models/metaresearch/llama-3/Transformers/8b-chat-hf/1), I see 8b-chat-hf, what's that? And where is the instruct version?

comments.author: Weiren
comments.content:
I think the 8b-chat-hf one is fine-tuned for dialogue use cases and in huggingface format. 

The instruct model I think you can download from hugging face then upload to kaggle.
comments.date: Posted 24 days ago  ·  172nd in this Competition

reply.author: Cristóbal Mackenzie
reply.content: I actually think the 8b-chat-hf is the same as the instruct model in huggingface.
reply.date: Posted 24 days ago  ·  215th in this Competition

reply.author: Weiren
reply.content: Yea, should be the same. thanks~
reply.date: Posted 24 days ago  ·  172nd in this Competition
